name: woodcarving
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] the process of cutting into the surface of wood to create a decorative shape or pattern: Some of the finest examples of woodcarving in Europe can be found in medieval churches.
[ C ] a piece of wood that has been decorated in this way: Her woodcarvings will be on display at the gallery next month.
Westend61/GettyImages
